title: Update ANTF Structure reference content (Ops)

requirements.text: Update the ANTF Structure reference page to match the provided “Anti-Narcotics Task Force (Ops)” organizational structure narrative, including: command hierarchy (Special Inspector General of Police; HQ Pune; Deputy Inspector General of Police at HQ; SP (Ops) Pune Unit; SP (Ops) Nagpur Unit), subordinate postings under Pune and Nagpur territory units, and the list of range districts for Dy.SP (Ops) divisions.

quotes:
Anti-Narcotics Task Force (Ops)
Structure of the Anti-Narcotics Task Force (Ops) :-
The Anti-Narcotics Task Force (Ops) is headed by a Special Inspector General of
Police...

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /antf-structure shows the ANTF hierarchy text consistent with the user-provided structure (head, HQ Pune, DIG at HQ, Pune/Nagpur SP units, subordinate Dy.SP postings, and range district mapping list).
All user-facing content on the page is in English.

requirements.text: Update the ANTF Structure page to include the Legal Advisor and Forensic Expert role descriptions exactly as provided (including responsibilities list for Legal Advisor and the note that the number of posts may be increased in the future depending on scope of work).

quotes: Legal Advisor:- There will be one Legal Advisor under the control of the Superintendent of Police (Ops)...
Forensic Expert:- There will be one Forensic Expert under the control of the Superintendent of Police (Ops)...

acceptanceCriteria: The ANTF Structure page contains a clearly labeled Legal Advisor section with the three responsibilities listed in order.
The ANTF Structure page contains a clearly labeled Forensic Expert section with the provided description and future-scope note.

requirements.text: Update the ANTF Structure page to include the staffing composition statement for each Dy.SP (Ops) Division (total 31 personnel and the breakdown: 01 Dy.SP, 02 PI, 02 API, 02 PSI, 24 officials).

quotes:
Each Deputy Superintendent of Police (Ops) Division has a total of 31 officers and
officials, including 01 Deputy Superintendent of Police, 02 Police Inspectors, 02 Assistant
Police Inspectors, 02 Police Sub-Inspectors and a total of 24 officials.

acceptanceCriteria: The ANTF Structure page displays the total strength (31) and the full breakdown of roles exactly as specified.

requirements.text: Correct obvious spelling/terminology issues in Appendix “A” and related ANTF Structure page copy while preserving meaning (e.g., Konkan/Kokan, Commissionerate spelling, and place-name spelling consistency) so the reference page reads professionally in English.

quotes: The list of districts falling under Pune and Nagpur sub-categories is as per Appendix "A"

acceptanceCriteria: Appendix “A” headings and district list items use consistent English spelling (e.g., “Konkan” and “Commissionerate”) and do not contain typographical errors such as “Commissionrate/Commissionarate”.
No change alters the intent of the jurisdiction mapping; only spelling/terminology cleanup is applied.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Adding new backend data models for ANTF structure content (this request is limited to updating the reference page content/presentation).
Integrating external systems or databases for jurisdiction/district lists.
